decryption_failed_info: Decryption failed due to a damaged file, an incorrect private key, or an incompatible decryption method.
data_embedding_info: Embedding encrypts files automatically using your chosen algorithm.
choose_image_to_extract: Select an Image(s) to Extract Hidden Data
choose_image_to_embed: Select an Image to Embed Data
embed_data_info: Only PNG files are supported to maintain data integrity and security.
unable_embed_data: Failed to Embed Data into Image
payload_too_large: The selected file(s) are too large to be embedded within the image!
embed_data_error: Unable to embed data. Ensure the payload fits within the image’s capacity and the selected files are within acceptable limits.
extract_data_error: Extraction failed. Possible reasons include an invalid image, incorrect private key, or incompatible encryption method.
encryption_algorithm_info: The algorithm used for encrypting files, text, and data embedded in images.
decryption_algorithm_info: The algorithm used for decrypting files, text, and embedded data.
manage_keys_info: These keys are used for encryption, decryption, and verification.
apply_agreement_info: I understand that clicking "Apply" erases history and unsaved keys mean lost files.
interface_language_info: Select the language for the application’s interface and messages.
about_page_info: AroCrypt is a software for encryption and decryption text and files, image steganograhpy with auto encryption.
update_info: A newer version of AroCrypt is available. Upgrading is recommended to maintain stability and prevent known issues.

app_theme.title: Application Theme
app_theme.desc: Customize the application's interface to suit your visual preferences.

safe_to_share: This package is public and are safe to share.

history.title: Operation History
history.desc: Keep a detailed log of all actions performed for reference.

shareable.title: Shareable Mode
shareable.desc: Use recipient’s key so only they can securely decrypt the content.

delete_source.title: Auto-Remove Source
delete_source.desc: Erase original files automatically once results are safely created.

single_output.title: Unified Output
single_output.desc: Store all results together in one chosen destination folder.

logs.logging_disabled: Logging disabled. Upcoming operations won't be tracked.

toast.text_decryption_msg: Decryption failed. This may occur if the private key is incorrect or the wrong algorithm is selected.
toast.file_limit_msg: You can select a maximum of 20 files.
toast.unexpected_error_msg: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again.
toast.file_encryption_msg: Unable to encrypt the file. Please try again.
toast.file_decryption_msg: Decryption failed. This may occur if the private key is incorrect, the wrong algorithm is selected, the file is corrupted, or permission is denied.
toast.payload_too_large_msg: The selected file(s) are too large to embed.
toast.data_embedding_msg: Failed to embed the data. Please try again.
toast.data_extraction_msg: Extraction failed. This may occur if the private key is incorrect, the wrong algorithm is selected, or no hidden data exists in the file.
toast.logs_deleted: All logs have been cleared from this section.
